text.value:
@concat('INSERT INTO ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_RESPONSE_FILE 
	(CREATED,
	CREATED_BY,
	LAST_UPD,
	LAST_UPD_BY,
	RES_TYPE,
	STATUS,
	FILE_NAME) OUTPUT INSERTED.RES_ID VALUES (CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	''',item().FILE_TYPE,''',
	''O'',''',item().FILE_NAME,''');')
